description_methods: Description: XOR encryption is a simple symmetric cipher based on the bitwise XOR operation.
Description: The Caesar cipher is a substitution cipher in which each character in the text is replaced by another, located at a certain constant distance to the left or right of it in the alphabet.
Description: The Vigener cipher is a method of encrypting text using a keyword. Each letter in the source text is shifted alphabetically by a variable number of characters.
description_methods_keys: Key requirement: positive or negative number.
Key requirement: a word written in Cyrillic or Latin script.
main_page: Select the encryption target in the menu at the bottom.
